alert.note: Alert for Wenatchee Area (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Spokane (Eastern Washington and Northern Idaho)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 06 at 9:31PM PST until January 07 at 9:00PM PST by NWS Spokane
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 PM PST SATURDAY FOR THE HIGHER ELEVATIONS AROUND WENATCHEE AND CHELAN... * WHAT...Wet snow expected for the higher elevations around Wenatchee and Chelan. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 5 inches. Pockets of freezing rain or drizzle possible at times. * WHERE...Number 2 Canyon, Cashmere, Chelan, Number 1 Canyon, Pangborn Airport, and Entiat. * WHEN...Until 9 PM PST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
